Lamentable la última actualización, lo convirtieron en una basura para estresarse todo el tiempo. Como se que no van a volver a atrás estos cambios porque les da igual, no creo que vuelva a jugarlo. Gracias, siempre se puede joder algo que anda bien.
Lots of camping killers, and players that sell you out to the killers. Not a fan of this metric of the game, changes to the format didnt help that. Also, the mechanics are a little off.

Now imma be honest when I first played dbd I was scared, because it can be a horror game. But now it's me and 3 other randoms shining a flashlight at a killer, sometimes it's some random team mate who loops the killer for the whole match while me and 2 other guys hold m1 on a gen. Now I played a lot on console but I can tell you that dead by daylight is still a great game.

Here is what to expect after the latest patch: Camping or Proxying Legions, Plagues, and Nurses all using the Call of Brine and Overcharged exploit (permanent 200% regression on every gen that gets kicked), and on top of that Thanatophobia which will end up adding 20 more seconds needed to complete every single generator. I wouldn't bother playing survivor until some update is made like adding more time on hook stages and obviously fixing the exploit. Feelsbadman the toxicity has stripped away the fun my boys and I would have on the weekends. This game is great if you're a killer main rn, it use to be a great game in general before the update playing both killer and survivor. rip dead hard, but also good riddance cause that was op.

I don't recommend this game at all... if you do want to try it, get a CDkey for like $2.

当前版本就是退游模拟器，现在卡破头去玩单纯是舍不得之前氪金氪太多了，现在情况就是大佬级别依然很秀，水平中等以及偏下的人类基本不可能跑掉了，然后这个赛季游戏环境更恶臭了，守尸针对已经习惯了免疫了，经常有专门折磨人类的屠夫搞你心态，队友也不救人，硬看着你二挂再救，只要开门战就算屠夫没一刀也不救人也不扛刀。（以上各种行为在游戏内都是允许的，我尊重也接受以上各种行为，毕竟游戏没有固定的玩法，只是我个人比较讨厌而已，遇到就会很糟心）大家尽量坚持玩吧，萌新或者考虑买游戏的话如果心态不好，那快跑，千万别回头

Prior to the most recent update this game was enjoyable to play as a survivor, however some tweaks to the fundamental systems of movement paired with killer buffs and survivor nerfs make this a much harder experience for anyone looking to play as a survivor. Overall it is no longer an enjoyable experience.

killers are too strong, so they nerfed the queue times

If you decide to play this game to play killer this game is for you with the new patch that came out. With that being said if you are new to this game and going to play survivor i would wait to get the game as right now its in a really bad place for new survivors even mid level survivors are going to have problems without having friends to play with. Playing killer is now as easy as pie even if you have 0 skill and have never played before you will be able to beat people with hundreds of hours in the game. I still love the game but i wouldn't recommend it for new people trying to play survivor as you will just want your money back.
dead hard kinda mid

Killers keep getting perks and revamped in so many ways. The only thing that could help from killers camping downed bodies is for the downed bodies to be able to heal themselves, but you have to wait for help (even with when you are the last in the game). It is to easy to play killer now.

After this last update, I can no longer recommend this one. 

Killers are vastly overpowered.

Hope survivors see better days in the fog.
Matchmaking could use some work, other then that I'd say the game is definitely very enjoyable. Player base isn't the greatest with the amount of angry nerds; but game wise I love it.

Com quase 2800hrs desse jogo, resolvi fazer uma avaliação desse jogo. O que eu posso dizer é que esse jogo tá um lixo nos tempos atuais. Já foi mais divertido jogar. Sim, tinha algumas coisas que eram muito "roubadas" antigamente (nurse de 5 blinks que diga...), mas os invés de balancear eles conseguiram estragar. Se fosse uns tempos atrás eu recomendaria, mas como está hoje enquanto escrevo essa análise, definitivamente não vale a pena. Não é a toa que você vai ouvir muitas reclamações de sobreviventes se matando o tempo todo no gancho. Tem um motivo e ele é bem obvio. O erro desse jogo é os devs, definitivamente eles não sabem o que significa "balancear". Se você quiser comprar e tirar suas próprias conclusões isso fica ao seu critério. É isso, boa sorte (você vai precisar...).
It's pretty cool

É um jogo muito bom, fica 10x melhor se tiver com os amigos, mas jogar solo é legal também (principalmente de killer (nos elos mais altos é meio tiltante) ).

El Juego es entretenido, y adictivo. Pero tiene varios puntos que me impiden disfrutarlo.

1.- Cuando juego de superviviente, los compañeros son como yo, mediocres y los asesinos, muchas veces toxicos.
2.- Cuando juego de asesino, te aparecen premades, que se dedican a burlarse de ti.

Asi que el juego es genial. Solo que los jugadores van a hacer que la experiencia de juego empeore.

Todo sea dicho cuando te encuentras una partida normal. Gente que no va a reirse de ti, e incluso asesinos majos, es un lujo

I would not recommend this game for new players. The DBD community (not all but still a huge majority) are extremely toxic to new players.
My advice is to use the perks that are the most fun, not the perks that provide the best chance of winning.

This is the only game I've ever negatively reviewed on steam and its such a shame because Ive had some really great times in the past, and met some fantastic people through it, such a shame its turned into this.

Déjà pénible à jouer en survivant avant la grosse mise à jour car 90% des tueurs étaient des campers/tunnelers, les devs se sont contentés de les up. Je peux comprendre l'excuse du "on camp/tunnel parce que le jeu le permet et/ou parce que les survivants nous éclatent" mais j'attendais justement que le rééquilibrage casse cette tendance. Il n'y a plus aucun intérêt à jouer survivant.

GÜZEL

so with 204 hours of being a survivor main , it was fun until this horrible update. Cause now im being tunneled and camped almost every game. 3 Games in a row where iv been tunneled instantly out , teammates intervening with chases , not helping other survivors on hook or that need healing instead they just keep doing a single gen or hide in lockers. The hitbox for killers are atrocious now too to where they can hit me from 10 ft away and the game is just terribly unbalanced now cause now survivors are getting perks that just dont help anymore so they have to go back to old builds while killers get perks that can change the tide of the game in a second. also if youre good at the game the killers will just facecamp you or tunnel
